divs: sighting detailsi went to look out back door for possible snowfall as reported to be possible tonight. i saw the object in the sky coming from the west and moving steadily toward the east. i proceeded to the front of the house where i saw it continuing east. i asked my wife to come look, and she commented on it as well. it continued travelling in an easterly direction, but i lost track of it as it was too cold to stand outside w\o shoes on. during the entire experience, there was no noise from the object observed, or from anywhere else since we live near edge of a very small town that "goes to bed" pretty early at night.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Jefferson
There were no other sightings in Jefferson on or around January 15th 2012
Summary: looked out west side of house for snow, saw object in sky moving eastward - went to east side of house and saw again moving away
